description: This script manages scheduled tasks (cron jobs) for uploading Wi-Fi logs, including starting and stopping the cron jobs, modifying crontab entries, and handling associated files.

methods.name: start_cron_job
methods.description: Starts the Wi-Fi log upload cron job if not already present, by modifying the crontab and creating a marker file.

methods.name: stop_cron_job
methods.description: Stops the Wi-Fi log upload cron job by removing related entries from crontab and deleting the marker file.
